name: The Barren Kingdoms
description:
Find your way through the echoes of a lost land.
In the alien world of The Barren Kingdoms magic crystals have grown rampant
and  infuse their surroundings with odd powers, that defy the laws of nature. 
You have the ability to control the crystals and utilize their potential.

Toy with physics, as you explore this wondrous place and it's long buried past.

CONTROL YOUR ENVIRONMENT
  Crystals sprawl through the Kingdoms and disrupt temperature and gravity.
They might turn a simple stone into a floating platform - or a devouring black hole.
You have the power to control these crystals!

⁃

EXPLORE FREELY
 Sometimes there are two sides to a coin - sometimes even a dozen!  The open
and non-linear level design and the intertwined core mechanics  enable you
to overcome any obstacle in your own way.

⁃

A LONG FORGOTTEN WORLD
Explore the Barren Kingdoms.  A world once lush and blooming - but now barren
and destroyed. Untangle the story of the Kingdom's downfall and it's founding days.
